name: Hatty Hunter:The book of xzola
description: This is a cool game and needs lot of platforming skills.... In this game there will be lots of enemies, boss battles and way more....It has a nice story.... Show who is the BOSS!!!..... It has a second part coming soon......You need to use your big brains in this game....... Do like the facebook page 'Nuclear Games'. Think over and over to find solutions..... Wait for the 2nd part next year...'Hatty Hunter : save the moon'.This game is made by Anwin Jayan.
